title: Demolitionist
summaries: The Demolitionist is an NPC vendor who sells explosives. He will move in once the following criteria have been met:

• There is available vacant house.
  • The player has an explosive in their inventory (items stored in storage items like chests, or portable storages like the Piggy Bank do not count towards this requirement).
  • The Merchant is present.
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) These requirements only apply to the initial spawning. If the Demolitionist is killed, he will automatically respawn after some time.
(Old-gen console and 3DS versions) If the Demolitionist is killed, he will only respawn if the above requirements are met again.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the Demolitionist will lob <linked>Grenades</linked> at nearby enemies to defend himself, which deal 20 / <linked>30</linked> / <linked>35</linked> damage at the start of the game.

Moreover, on the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, <linked>NPCs</linked> including the Demolitionist will gain <linked>various stat increases</linked> as the player progresses.
